data.name: Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs
data.app_name: Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs
data.description:
Join Red, Chuck, Bomb & the Blues to save the stolen eggs in Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs, the immersive VR game that puts a bird-flinging slingshot in the palm of your hand!

Explore a remote island where the greedy green pigs take their vacation in 104 fun-filled stages, or build your own levels to share with your friends. The Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs community has made more than 17,000 user-created levels to date, so you’ll always have plenty of towers to take aim at and pigs to pop!

Travel to exotic beaches, steep cliffs & snowy slopes while destroying structures in the most spectacular ways,. and then slingshot your way through even more challenging “Spooky Levels” of Dr. Frankenswine — where the beaches are scary, the cliffs are creepy, the slopes are slimy & the peaks are terrifying.

A whole new angle on classic Angry Birds gameplay from your fine-feathered friends at Resolution Games.

changelog.change_log:
Full graphics remaster for all scenes!

Updated particle effects

Improved haptics that scales depending on damage

Fixed to correct slingshot to hand offset

Added new one handed play mode

Menus open on menu button press

Added full Chinese (zh-HANT and zh-HANS) support

Achievement update

Just in time for Halloween, Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs is now even spookier with the addition of the “Slimy Slopes” level pack, featuring 13 brand new Spooky Levels. In this third world of the Spooky Levels, players will yet again meet Dr. Frankenswine and must defeat him to get a step closer to saving the stolen eggs.
3.3 Update - the game supports Mixed Reality Capture now!

The level builder has migrated online! This egg-citing update from Resolution Games gives players the ability to not only create but also share the levels of their dreams with friends of the flock, receive ‘likes’, and explore an unlimited amount of player-created content.

Whether you want to flex your creative muscles and strive to be recognized among the most popular levels, or just browse and play new and exciting levels based on popularity, difficulty or uploaded time, one thing is certain: the sky’s the limit!

It’s time to wield your slingshots and construction hats! In the latest Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs update, players can now - for the first time ever in any Angry Birds game - design and play their very own levels. 

The new level builder is free to all players and welcomes back familiar fowl and swine while introducing new Construction Pigs to supervise the process. The dedicated space within the game features a new island environment where players can play, create and destroy their own amazing creations.

Now the game also supports French, German, Latin American Spanish, Japanese and Korean.

Dr. Frankenswine took over the Isle of Pigs and transformed it into his own paradise. He took over all the eggs again and left a set of new levels. 
New in this version:
- Maliboo Beach and Creepy Climb are available with 26 new levels
